name: WRAOccupationalExposureToPotentialAsthmaInducingRiskFactorICD10CM
title: WRA (Occupational Exposure to Potential Asthma Inducing Risk Factor) (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has had an occupational exposure to asthma inducing environment or substance regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: occcupational exposure to asthma inducing environment or substance),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Occupational exposure to environmental tobacco smoke
